title: fix: align auto-polly with main polly setup
author: Itachi-1824

gist.headline: Polly gets her eyes
gist.blurb: Our favorite automated bee is now smarter, more observant, and aligned with her main directives.
gist.summary: Updated the auto-fix workflow to match the main Polly setup, enabling dynamic router versions, smart response behaviors, and automatic issue reactions.
gist.impact: Issue interactions will feel more natural with automatic 'eyes' reactions and context-aware responses.
gist.visual_concept: Polly the bee and the Monitor Robot synchronizing. The robot is displaying 'eyes' on its screen to represent the new reaction feature. They are connecting a cable or looking at a shared clipboard.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot and the monitor robot synchronizing data cables. The robot's screen shows a pair of pixelated eyes looking at a checklist. Lime green (#ecf874) and soft lavender background. Warm lighting, cozy atmosphere like Stardew Valley. Pixel text: 'SYNCED'. Chunky sprites, 8-bit aesthetic.
